title: Youta
description: Veggie eatery located 600m before the Myanmar border, in an alley east of the main road. Speaks Thai only. Offers an assortment of 3 or 4 different ready-made vegetables and mock-meat dishes (just point out which one you want to eat there or take away). Also sell a few prepackaged food items such as TVP, dry noodles, canned mock-meats and more. Outside banner advertise Youta products.
